active_learning.discussion_prompt: Using NIST SP 800-53A Rev. 5, debate whether common security controls like multi-factor authentication (MFA) are sufficient against modern phishing attacks in a cloud environment. Consider control effectiveness (implementation, operation, and outcomes), implementation challenges, and real-world case studies such as the SolarWinds supply chain breach. Support arguments with assessment methods (examine, interview, test) and propose enhancements.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
